name: Home Alone (PS 2)
description:
YOU'RE HOME ALONE!

Your parents are away and the burglars are at the door! It's time to bring out the crazy home-made tricks and traps in this thrilling action game based on the hilarious Home Alone movie by Twentieth Century Fox!
From the garden to the attic, and the basement to the bedrooms, use your wits -- as well as a couple of well-placed firecrackers -- to bash the bad guys through 10 levels of fantastic Home Alone action!

  • Choose to play as one of four clever kids -- Kevin, Kelly, Carl.and Carly -- as you try to outwit the crafty crooks!
  • Use anything from a bowling ball to a pet tarantula to scare the burglars away!
  • Play with a friend and take out the troublesome thieves together!
